overview: One term at England’s sexiest boarding school was never, ever destined to be enough, as this second horny collection of bad boy boarders take the study of anatomy to a whole new level. Tim Law, Connor Levi and everybody’s favourite schoolboy, Jaxon Radoc, show just how smooth and sexy young students can be, as we return to the dorm for a repeat performance of sucking and fucking between lessons. These boys study hard – and bang ass even harder!
title: Bareback Boarders 2
